dmca.title: Notice of Infringement
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Powell, Elena [LEG] [mailto:Elena.Powell@sprint.com] 
Sent: Monday, December 19, 2005 1:27 PM
To: Copyright@theplanet.com; Groner, Kalman
Subject: Notice of Infringement




December 19, 2005 

Via E-Mail and Fed Ex 
Kalman Groner 
920 East 17th Street 
Brooklyn,  NY   11230 

Via E-Mail and Fed Ex 
George Poletes, Corporate Counsel 
ThePlanet.com Internet Services 
1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110 
Dallas,  TX   75207 

Dear Messrs. Groner and Poletes: 

This is to advise you that 877 PCS Promotions is engaging in activity on its
website at  <file://www.pcspromotions.com> www.pcspromotions.com that
infringes Sprint's intellectual property rights and could mislead consumers
to believe that Sprint and 877 PCS Promotions are distribution partners.
The site is hosted on servers belonging to kangaroo Partners and is
transmitted using theplanet.com's network services.   

Specifically, 877 PCS Promotions is using the SPRINT trademark, DIAMOND LOGO
DESIGN trademark and Sprint trade dress ("Sprint Property") on the web site
at  <file://www.pcspromotions.com> www.pcspromotions.com.  It also lists
itself as an "Authorized Dealer" on the home page and as a "leading Sprint
PCS Online retailer of wireless phones and service plans" in the "About Us"
section of its web site.  The Sprint Nextel Law Department sent an e-mail to
the site's administrative contact, Jeff Lorenzo at domains@pcspromotions.com
on November 11, 2005 demanding cessation of these activities.  Mr. Lorenzo
responded and acknowledged that they do not have a license to use the Sprint
property.  Sprint replied that in the absence of a license, 877 PCS
Promotions will have to cease using Sprint-owned trademarks and trade dress.
The company has not responded and has not complied as of the date of this
complaint.  Copies of these communications and a printout of their home page
that clearly uses the Sprint Property is attached in support.  

1.      A printout of the ownership, DNS and network record is attached. 
2.      The intellectual property claimed to be infringed: SPRINT trademark,
DIAMOND LOGO DESIGN trademark and trade dress 

3.      The owner of the intellectual property is Sprint Communications
Company L.P., 6200 Sprint Parkway, Overland Park, KS 66251. Telephone
numbers are (913) 315-8315 or (703) 433-3179.

4.      Goods and services covered by the marks are: telecommunications
services. 
5.      The dates of first use are: for SPRINT: 2/7/1977 and for DIAMOND
LOGO DESIGN: 7/1/1986 
6.      The dates of first use in interstate commerce are: for SPRINT:
2/7/1977 and for DIAMOND LOGO DESIGN: 7/1/1986 
7.      The activity Sprint believes is infringing: Unauthorized use by 877
PCS Promotions of Sprint-owned trademarks and trade dress.

8.      The goods and/or services covered by or offered under the mark
claimed to be infringing: telecommunications 
9.      The precise location of the mark:  web pages at
<file://www.pcspromotions.com> www.pcspromotions.com 
10.     Contact information for  <file://www.pcspromotions.com>
www.pcspromotions.com: Administrative contact: Jeff Lorenzo,
domains@pcspromotions.com, 877 PCS Promotions, 12561 Biscayne Blvd., North
Miami Beach, Florida 33181.  

I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the Sprint Property.  The
information in this statement / notification is accurate to the best of my
information, knowledge and belief. I state and certify under penalty of
perjury that Sprint Communications Company L.P. has a good faith belief that
use of the Sprint Property as described in this complaint is not authorized
by the owner or any of its agents and therefore infringes on Sprint's
intellectual property rights.  

877 PCS Promotions' activities infringe on Sprint's intellectual property
rights and appear to violate theplanet.com's policies.   Accordingly Sprint
asks theplanet.com and/or Kangaroo Partners to contact the infringer and
demand that they stop engaging in this misrepresentation and infringement
and/or disable access to their site.

Very truly yours, 

Elena Powell 
Sr. Legal Analyst 
Sprint Nextel 
6450 Sprint Parkway, KSOPHN0312-3A500 
Overland Park,  KS  66251 


<<pcspromocorresp.pdf>> <<pcspromorecord.pdf>>
